verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishuddu lellaru yesun pogadi paadi Yaarbaatinchi paramuna nunda paramaananda Geeta machata dwanimpa neevachata Nunduvaa ? (3 times) naa manasamaa !{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gorre pillayu raajya meluchunda naa shritu Lellaru naayananu chera mitru della Kanneeti duduchu chunda nee vachata Nunduvaa ? naa maanasamaa !{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Peturu Poulu Yohaanu nachata pitaamahulu Yapostululandaru hatha saakshu lellaru Samaaveshimpa nee vachata Nunduvaa ? naa manasamaa !{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jagamulo siluvanu mosinacho Kireetamu dhariyinchi bhasilluduru deva Putrulugaa nellaru maaragaa nee Vachata nundu vaa ? naa manasamaa !{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shodhanala jayinchina veerulella Kasta shrama lorchina mahaatmulu Jyotirmayulugaa noppaaru chunda Nee vachata nunduvaa ? naa manasamaa !{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kanya karani naadu prabhu sanghamu Raaju Yesu pendli kumaaruniki bharyagaa Prakaashimpa daani ruchimpa nee vachata Nunduvaa ? naa maanasamaa ne nachata Nundedanu naa yesu thoda{/lang-eng}
